provider.name: Deepinfra
provider.description: DeepInfra makes it easy to run the latest machine learning models in the cloud.

models.title: Chat Completions
models.description: Portkey supports all OpenAI compatible chat models on deepinfra

notSupported.promptPlayground: Prompt playground is not supported for Deepinfra models

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Use Portkey Python SDK to make text calls to Deepinfra chat completions models
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python code for Meta-Llama-3.1-405B-Instruct text call on Deepinfra

openAINodeSDK.description: Use OpenAI Node.js SDK to make text calls to Deepinfra chat completions models

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Deepinfra using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Deepinfra and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Deepinfra API key from the Deepinfra website [here](https://deepinfra.com/login).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for Meta-Llama-3.1-405B-Instruct chat completions call on Deepinfra using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for Meta-Llama-3.1-405B-Instruct chat completions call on Deepinfra using virtual key
